data.persona: I a ma parrot that comes from exotic places.  My features are colorful.  I am able to repeat some phases said by humans.
data.description:
You are in the Mars desert.
The desert is never ending, there are small craters all over and all you can see is red sand for miles. There is no sight of water anywhere, it is unbelievably hot.
There's a sand here.
The iguana is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the iguana so that I can kill it.
data.mid_motivation: I am looking for food and water in this vast and strange desert, so different from my home place of lush jungles.
data.long_motivation: I will look for someone to help me return to my home, and I must survive this strange new land.
